title: The WHO is tracking a new COVID-19 variant called Mu that might be able to evade immunity from vaccines and previous infections
content:
1. The WHO is tracking a new COVID-19 variant called Mu that might be able to evade immunity from vaccines and previous infections  Yahoo News
  2. World Health Organization is monitoring a new COVID variant called 'Mu'  WXYZ-TV Detroit | Channel 7
  3. WHO investigating new COVID-19 variant named mu  Fox News
  4. WHO says it is monitoring a new Covid variant called 'mu'  CNBC
  5. COVID-19: New 'Mu variant' from Colombia could be vaccine resistant -WHO  The Jerusalem Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: WHOは、ワクチンや過去の感染による免疫を回避できる可能性のある「Mu」と呼ばれるCOVID-19の新種を追跡調査しています。
世卫组织正在追踪一种名为Mu的COVID-19新变体，它可能能够逃避疫苗和先前感染的免疫力。
世衛組織正在追蹤一種名爲Mu的COVID-19新變體，它可能能夠逃避疫苗和先前感染的免疫力。
